name: Crazy Submarine Hero Fire Up!
description:
A brand new endless hunter emerges from the dark depths. Jump into an aquatic adventure filled with bots, bullets, and bubbles.
The Deep Sea holds hidden treasures waiting to be discovered, but these waters are fraught with dangerous foes.
- NAVIGATE the Deep Sea by dragging the submarine left and right with your finger!
- UPGRADE your submarine's weapon and boosts to blast through BIG bosses and collect crazy amounts of coins!
- DIVE DEEP and travel as far as possible to uncover the mysteries of the Deep Sea! Can you get the high score?
